body_html:
I really have no ability to test this, so I am marking it as community support. You might try asking on stackoverflow which might have more AWS docker users.

  • Make sure you docker pull to make sure your container is up to date.
  • Make sure to upgrade your nvidia-docker install.
  • I would also try making sure you can run a non-tensorflow cublas program (perhaps one of the nvidia demos).
body_text:
I really have no ability to test this, so I am marking it as community support. You might try asking on stackoverflow which might have more AWS docker users.

Make sure you docker pull to make sure your container is up to date.
Make sure to upgrade your nvidia-docker install.
I would also try making sure you can run a non-tensorflow cublas program (perhaps one of the nvidia demos).
body:
I really have no ability to test this, so I am marking it as community support. You might try asking on stackoverflow which might have more AWS docker users.
- Make sure you docker pull to make sure your container is up to date.
- Make sure to upgrade your nvidia-docker install.
- I would also try making sure you can run a non-tensorflow cublas program (perhaps one of the nvidia demos).
